data.title: Great food but beware of the clown in the kitchen
data.text:
Went here for two mornings in a row as the bagels and coffee were really good. The only reason we stopped going is when I saw somebody go to the toilet and the guy from the kitchen took hold of his key and unlocked the door despite myself shouting at him that somebody was in there. He still ignored us and continued in before seeing the occupant also shouting at him. By this point he was completely in the room and made a swift exit. 

Other than that the staff behind the counter were really friendly and made excellent recommendations. The French Toast was absolutely amazing!!

data.title: Grab a quick breakfast or lunch here if you are in the area
data.text: I lived close to this place and was always good for breakfast, particularly if you want pastries, they have a wide choice. Also sandwiches are good and at very reasonable price compared to the average of SF. Staff really friendly too. If you need a quick breakfast or lunch in this area grab it here

data.title: Lovely cafe
data.text: Cozy atmosphere right on the busy Market street. The whole crust pepperoni pizza was delicious as was the vegetarian chili. Large selection of baked goods looked very tasty as well.

data.title: ENERGY BARS ARE AWESOME!!
data.text: This past Labor Day, we had a wonderful selection of bagels, cookies (chocolate chip, sprinkle, snickerdoodle, butterscotch), brownies, and cherry pie.  The best part about their pasties is that they are NOT overly sweet.  It satisfies the sweet tooth but not overwhelmed with sweetness and they taste super yummy.  I am not a fan of cherry pie because as they are usually so gooey and sweet, but their cherry pie made me a convert.  It was a little tart as FRESH cherries, yes they use fresh cherries should be, and the filling held up nicely when you cut into it.  It didn't ooze all over the place.  I loved the cherry pie.  The bagels were yummy, many different types, cheese, everything, jalapeno cheese, pesto.  But my favorite item was their ENERGY BAR!!  We took it on our hike and everyone had it for the first time and it was AWESOME.  It is a solid bar that holds up well on hikes, and I thought it would be crunchy like most energy bars, but NO, it was solid but VERY moist inside and super delicious!  We were told that EVERYTHING, even the marzipan is made in house.  That shows me that they are really into maintaining quality.  Awesome stuff!!

data.title: Worth it!!
data.text: Stumbled upon this place while wondering around San Fran. My wife and I share a piece of pizza, cheese cake and oatmeal cookie (everything looked so good). It was all very good.

data.title: Nice but a little pricey
data.text: Nice composition of sandwiches and croissants such as the Brie/tomato/greens/apple chutney I had. Service was alright but not overwhelmingly friendly. A little pricey for what I got (croissant + double shot espresso for just under 10 $).

data.title: Great food, vegan friendly
data.text: Stopped in randomly during bike ride. Went for hot chocolate, but ended up getting vegan chili, vegan cookies, and espresso. Everything was delicious. Employees were very friendly and helpful. Would recommend to everyone, sure rest of food is good if the vegan goodies are excellent. Just wish I could have had more!

data.title: Breakfast TOP
data.text:
Every morning for breakfast during my holiday in SF. 
Two cup cake, two espresso ( very Italian style) 8-10 USD. Very nice location, near my hotel. Various cupcake, brioches and sandwich. This is perfect!!!

data.title: Nice place!
data.text: Nice place, plenty of choice on the cake side, good coffe (i tried a cappuccino) and friendly staff. Very nice experience!

data.title: Not bad little find
data.text:
We dropped by here hungry one morning. There were a huge range of cakes but a slightly limited breakfast selection - possibly we were after the morning rush. 
Had a coffee and a slightly disappointing bagel. My friend had a breakfast sandwich which he said was good. Friendly staff. Small but with decent wifi to while away an hour people watching.

data.title: Excellent pastry
data.text: The best pastry ever tried in de US. The store is very nice as also the staff. The scones and the muffins are very good.

data.title: SWEET!
data.text: The best bakery ever and I have visited good ones in Paris many times before.  This is a must stop bakery for cakes, pies, croissants, and much more!  Oh and they made me one awesome hot chocolate with real chocolate!

data.title: Petit déjeuner simple.
data.text:
Commerce d'angle très lumineux. 
Service agréable et courtois. 
Le croissant est trop sec pas assez de beurre pour un français ;)
Mobilier en bois chaleureux.

data.title: Tutto buono e genuino
data.text: Abbiamo preso un panino e la zuppa del giorno, molto buoni e genuini .  Poi invogliati dalla vetrina abbiamo preso due dolcetti, molto buoni e poco dolci . Consigliato
